titleStmt.title: The peti[tion] of the [inhabi]tants of Cy[rencester,] whose names ar[e hereunto] subscribed Presented to His M[ajesty] at Oxford. With His Maiest[yes] answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Sollace, Andrew.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) aut

publicationStmt.publisher: February 28. By Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Printed, by His Majesties command, at Oxford [i.e. London] :

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 3 by Andrew Sollace and 45 others.
Imprint is false, a London counterfeit -- Madan.
Publication year given according to Lady Day dating.
Imperfect: title page lacking upper corner affecting transcription.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
